summary: Quick standup where team members introduced themselves. QA (Jordan) requested that when work is ready for testing the team send 'Ready for testing!' with the expected output; PM, Developer, and Architect are available for assignments.

actions.task: When a feature or change is ready for testing, send 'Ready for testing!' with the expected output to QA (Jordan)

risks.risk: No specific tasks or priorities were assigned during the meeting, which may lead to idle time or misaligned work.
risks.mitigation: PM (Sarah) to assign or prioritize tasks and communicate next work items; developers to confirm picks; architect to proactively review architecture/design backlog items.
